item.title: Sidewalk art removal continues in Sarasota
item.description: The city of Sarasota is next in line to remove asphalt artwork from sidewalks and crosswalks. It’s a move by the Florida Department of Transportation.

item.description: The Sarasota Police Department will never call someone and demand money.

item.description: The health department advises against any water-related activities there.

item.title: Suspect in 2006 sexual battery case in Sarasota is found in Tennessee
item.description: Eleazar Briones-Vega, 50, is awaiting extradition to Florida.

item.description: Some victims never received any work, the sheriff said.

item.title: Feds stop sending detainees to ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: Dismantling the facility could cost the state between $15 million and $20 million.

item.title: 5-year-old girl swept into Sarasota storm drain has died
item.description: 'The family is grateful for all the love and support shown over the past few days.' the GoFundMe page said.

item.title: A little wet at times for Labor Day weekend
item.description: Look for scattered showers and thunderstorms basically on Sunday and Monday.
